findings.title: Typo on comment
findings.description: Across the codebase, there is a typo on the comment.

findings.title: Tokens could be sent / withdrawn multiple times by accident
findings.description: Functions closeQuestPeriod() and closePartOfQuestPeriod() have similar functionality but interfere with each other, causing tokens to be sent/withdrawn multiple times by accident.

findings.title: Limit possibilities of `recoverERC20()`
findings.description: Function `recoverERC20()` in contract `MultiMerkleDistributor.sol` allows the retrieval of all ERC20 tokens from the `MultiMerkleDistributor.sol` whereas the comment indicates it is only meant to retrieve those tokens that have been sent by mistake.

findings.title: Old quests can be extended via `increaseQuestDuration()`
findings.description: Function `increaseQuestDuration()` does not check if a quest is already in the past. Extending a quest from the past in duration is probably not useful.

findings.title: Accidental call of `addQuest` could block contracts
Reduce impact of `emergencyUpdatequestPeriod()`
findings.description: Adding a check to `emergencyUpdatequestPeriod()` to prevent calling `updateQuestPeriod()` when not closed yet.
